Deficiency Narrative: It was determined that a child in care in care was treated in an unnecessary manner and harsh manner when a caregiver pushed them.
It was determined that a caregiver cursed at a child in care.
During the inspection, it was found that the reference checks were not completed fully and missing minimum standard requirements.
Correction Narrative: On 10/10/24, the operation Executive Director emailed their assigned licensing representative and provided two attachments (1.) an updated reference check form; (2.) their own Verification of Employment form for references as part of their follow up response. The operation reported that after the last inspection the assigned licensing representative conducted, they updated their reference check form template and added to it the question, "How would they be working with children?" for the interviewer to ask the reference person(s). The Executive Director reported they will also add to the template a place for documenting when a reference person(s) is unreachable and/or if the operation is unsuccessful in completing the interview and the reason for this. They reported that if the reference person(s) is permanently unreachable, then they will include their assessment of the prospective employee's suitability to work with or around children. They also reported they will add to the form the attempts that were made to reach the reference person(s) and an explanation of the reason the reference person was unreachable.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection one child file was evaluated. It was found that one child has been administered medication for sleep that was discontinued by the health care professional as of 6/29/24.
Correction Narrative: During the inspection one child file was evaluated. It was observed that prescription medication instructions were followed accurately.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection, it was found that the staff file didn't have documentation to show that the staff obtained a high school diploma or a GED or documentation for home schooling, if applicable.
Correction Narrative: On 2/2/24, the operation sent an email to licensing stating that a copy of the employee's high school diploma was provided to Brotherhood Academy on January 26, 2024. This documentation is filed in the employee's personnel record.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection, one staff file reviewed was missing the signed/dated statement for immediately reporting abuse/neglect, exploitation to the A/N hotline.
Correction Narrative: On 2/2/24, the operation sent an email to licensing stating that the employee signed and dated a statement confirming the requirement that they must immediately report suspected child abuse, neglect, or exploitation on January 25, 2024. This signed and dated statement is filed in the employee's personnel record.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection, it was found that the non-prescription cabinet for medications was unlocked. This was corrected at inspection.
